def con(a):
    summ=0
    while True:
        summ+=a%10
        a/=10
        if(a==0):
            break
    if((summ/10)>=1):
        return con(summ)
    else:
        return summ
for _ in xrange(input()):
    s_li=[]
    input()
    li=map(int,raw_input().split())    
    for j in xrange(len(li)):
        s_li.append(con(li[j])) 
    big=max(s_li)
    color=['red','blue','pink','white','black','violet','cyan','yellow','green','brown']
    print color[big]
